description.value: You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Animal], heightened to 9th level, as an innate primal spell that you can cast once per day, but can only summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Purple Worm]. At 20th level, you can summon an elite purple worm instead.

source.value: Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm
